title: Filet Mignon
shortDesc: A classic - Tenderloin filet with your choice of toppings.
longDesc: A tenderloin filet from certified organic grass-fed cows. Cooked to perfection in a water bath set to 130 degrees, briefly seared under an 800 degree broiler and topped with your choice of flavor enhancers
